# Purpose

This vignette is intended for authors of the **simple** package. 


# Naming and Coding convention

## Naming

## Coding

### Style

### Packages

Wherever possible, base R functions should be used and chosen over functions from other packages. E.g., use

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dat2 <- 
  dat[
    dat$column == 1,
    ]
```

instead of

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
dat2 <- 
  dat %>% 
  filter(
    column == 1
  )
```
